body.p: The Gentoo Weekly Newsletter reports about the brandnew Chinese user forum set up only yesterday. The Future Zone looks at all available or upcoming virtualization techniques in Portage or on their way there, while the Tips & Tricks section introduces two great new tools for editing the USE flags and other system settings, profuse and portage-prefpane. Check the photo gallery from the Gentoo Christmas bowling event in Germany, and if you're in Tokyo around the 28th, don't miss the GentooJP year-end party!
